name: Ode to Blissful Bull Run
description: An ambient generative musical composition expressing the optimistic exciting feeling felt during a bull run. A percussive sound rhythmically plays a pattern that slightly evolves over time changing a bit each bar. Chords play in the major scale evoking a feeling of happiness each chord is unpredictable but still follows a musical pattern. Atop the chords a higher pitched synth plays bursts of arpeggiated notes in harmony with the chords. A rhythmic bass-line ties the piece together giving it structure.
